content:
Hi everyone, I'm wondering whether the CompartmentDefinition for Patient is still up-to-date with regards to Device?

Device is listed under 'The following resources are never in this compartment', yet there is a reference to Patient in the Device profile. For instance, when invoking patient-everything, I'd expect devices affixed to the patient to show up in the resulting SearchSet.
Sounds like a change request is needed.

@Jose Costa Teixeira There's already a similar ticket on your name on this topic: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23704
Could you elaborate on the motion of the ticket? Was it intended to add device to the compartment?
